resume.title: Director of Operations
resume.description: Metropolitan manages 90 residential and commercial buildings and homeowners associations. As Director of Operations I create the vision for systems and workflows while overseeing day-to-day business activity. I own and oversee several essential systems: operations, database, communications, and accounting. Most importantly, I guide new clients through the first 90 days of the management contract.

resume.title: Owner
resume.description: Lucky Grain created artisan furniture from locally recycled tree waste. We met our goal to reduce landfill waste by reusing waste material for all client projects. As owner of Lucky Grain I managed all business activity including bookeeping, customer relations, social media management, material sourcing, machinery upkeep, and design and build on all projects.

resume.title: Program Manager
resume.description: As Program Manager at a growing technology marketing company, my main objective ensured that all client orders were filled timely and that quality leads were delivered and formatted to customer satisfaction. Additionally I captured daily, weekly, and monthly revenue numbers at a company with average annual revenue of $9MM.

resume.title: Operations Manager
resume.description: Under the direction of the company President, I managed day-to-day operations and maintained processes that allowed the business to double in under two years.
